name: Spacefight
description:
Two Ragdolls fighting in a faulty space station, what could go wrong!

Use the QWOP-esque controls to move around the capsule and stay away from the faulty airlocks, if you get sucked into space you're dead.

Press 'down' to grab onto walls and objects around the cabin, and use the left and right keys to swing your body around. Try to out-maneuver your opponent or try to throw them out into the void of space to win.

Controls:
Player 1: A, S, D
Player 2: Left, Down, Right
